column3: Latest;Preah Sihanouk province------ (Preliminary news) A fire caused damage in two shops
column4: but no casualties were reported.------The incident happened at 1pm on March 25
column6: around the Old Theater in Sangkat No 2
column9: police dispatched fire trucks to help prevent the spread. According to the fire department
column10: the fire was caused by a faulty  generator. ------TVFB
